name: KALEIDO STELLA-Original Sound Track
detailed_description:
Includes 9 songs including the theme song "Stella" in addition to the main game song used for the PC game "Kaleidoscope Stella".
The theme song vocal is Mr. Kaji Kamu. A delicate and beautiful world, sung by gentle singing voices.
Please enjoy the space of the bright sound colored by talented musician Ryo Lion.

【recorded music】
1.Stella (off vocal)
2. GAS
3.Twe magnetic
4. Planet dance
5. dark nebla
6. At a rich night
7. A dream of a red star
8. Kaleido of meteors
9. Stella (vo: sunflower)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Graphics: 960 × 640 or more 32 bit full color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Graphics: 960 × 640 or more 32 bit full color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
